credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Herman Miller Summer Picnic, July 28, 1984
provenance: Acquired new and directly from designers, museums, and cultural institutions by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
medium: Silkscreen with lacquer finish on wove paper
description: The composition is like a close-up cropping of a photograph. A salad of green lettuce, red potatoes, red-and-white radishes, yellow-and-white eggs, sprinkled with chopped leeks and spices and covered in white dressing, is piled high in a dark-blue bowl. At the bottom, is an inscription in white: "herman miller summer picnic  july 28, 1984".
name: Poster
